Superagency in the Workplace

Artificial intelligence has arrived in the workplace and has the potential to be as transformative as the steam engine was to the 19th-century Industrial Revolution. With powerful and capable large language models, we have entered a new information technology era. McKinsey research sizes the long-term AI opportunity at $4.4 trillion in added productivity growth potential from corporate use cases.

Key Concepts:

  • AI in the workplace
  • Transformative power of AI
  • Long-term potential of AI
  • Short-term returns of AI
  • Corporate use cases
  • Gen AI capabilities
  • Rapid progress in AI
  • Unlocking AI's full potential
